section.title: Bulk Extract Error Reporting
section.para: Basic error reporting metrics are captured during the creation of the bulk extract data files. In the same directory as the data files, error.txt is created to report errors that occurred during bulk extraction.

The error.txt file indicates that errors occurred during the process, and the latest successful full extract should be obtained. A list is included to provide more specific information about the type of errors that were encountered. The file lists the number of errors that occurred per entity type.
section.programlisting:
Errors occurred during generation of the extract. Please obtain the latest successful full extract.
6 errors occurred for entity type learningObjective 15 errors occurred for entity type studentSectionAssociation 9 errors occurred for entity type studentAssessment 3 errors occurred for entity type course 11 errors occurred for entity type studentSchoolAssociation 1 errors occurred for entity type staff 3 errors occurred for entity type student 1 errors occurred for entity type grade 7 errors occurred for entity type courseTranscript 1 errors occurred for entity type staffProgramAssociation 1 errors occurred for entity type studentParentAssociation 5 errors occurred for entity type studentAcademicRecord 2 errors occurred for entity type attendance 1 errors occurred for entity type parent 22 errors occurred for entity type studentGradebookEntry 1 errors occurred for entity type gradingPeriod 1 errors occurred for entity type studentCohortAssociation 1 errors occurred for entity type section 67 errors occurred for entity type learningStandard 1 errors occurred for entity type staffEducationOrganizationAssociation 1 errors occurred for entity type studentCompetency 1 errors occurred for entity type graduationPlan 7 errors occurred for entity type courseOffering 2 errors occurred for entity type assessment 1 errors occurred for entity type staffCohortAssociation
